text: Mba harigi gumgi gu mbigi, mba bigɨna mbatɨga phuni khegene mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzgi fhuv ntɨɨri. Mbe ndavi domdorgiap, kɨr mba gumgi nduarira wari won farir kargiap rotu mbui bigi ga segi fhu ntɨɨri ma. Mbe ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi rotu mbui tɨvi thagi fhu. Mbe vhɨra mbarɨvi gu tori, gor gu sirvar bras gu ŋkɨɨa khirar kargi bigi ntuu rotur muuŋ thagi fhu. Mba bigi rɨmgi kav, gari fhu, khuari kav, buni mbararagi fhu. Mbe vhɨra rui fhu.
